website_summaries.verdict: This brace doesn't lack in terms of support and stability, although some suggest that it can be uncomfortable.
pros: A single strap not only holds this ankle brace securely in place, it can also be adjusted to fit into shoes with high and low tops
This ankle brace has a hinge that allows full range of motion
cons: The hard material that goes under the bottom of the foot can be a bit painful to some

customer_reviews.title: Works good for skateboarding.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I was looking for, and is way cheaper than "prescription" braces. Works great, comfortable fit. Can wear with shoes. Does the trick, stops your ankle from rolling and spraining. I sprained my ankle skateboarding, and I'll put this on sometimes to prevent further damage, and it doesn't feel too invasive. I do recommend maybe wearing two layers of tall socks on your foot though, to help with compression to keep swelling down, and also soften the feeling of the brace.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: As I said above, a brace that's not so flexible on the sides and able to support my ankle better.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok in the sense that it was what I was looking for, but, the brace it self is to flexible, it doesn't secure my ankle as I thought it would; I tried it and the first uneven pavement I stepped on, I twisted my ankle when I thought the brace would secure my ankle from twisting. I'm looking for a more rigid brace that the sides won't flex to the sides like this one did.
customer_reviews.author: vnoifvet

customer_reviews.title: Great Brace for Active People
customer_reviews.text: After having a lot of troubles with my ankle and after the most recent sprain during the volleyball game I've decided to buy pair of this Active Ankle supporters. This brace is easy to use and very light-weight. The only minus of that model is that after some time of usage (half in year in my case) the joint makes squeaky sound which, I believe, can not be removed by applying a grease. All in all this is the grate durable brace for the active people with some ankle troubles who want to be in game.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey M.

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Daughters collegiate volleyball coach requires her players to double brace. It took my daughter a few days to get used to them (and to fit into her shoes), but they’re a great product and I would recommend to anybody looking.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gallego

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My dads been wearing it daily since Christmas. He feels so much safer walking around without twisting his ankle. Awesome product. If my dad wears it I guarantee it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T May

customer_reviews.title: Great for volleyball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's volleyball coach required these and I'm glad because they are great. My daughter has weak ankles and tends to roll her ankles, but not while wearing these! She loves them. Very solid lateral support while allowing plenty of movement in the right direction. These should also work well for baskeball players and anyone else playing a sport where you can tend to roll an ankle. I wish I had these when I played because I had sprained ankles all the time playing basketball. Top notch quality. Very durable and well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: not very durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's volleyball coach requires the players to wear ankles braces. Most of the girls wear this brace. By less than half way through the season (2 1/2 months) three of the players have had the brace break. The rigid plastic on the bottom part of the brace just cracks in half and then the brace is unusable. Sports equipment isn't expected to last forever, but for the price they should last at least through the season!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1234

customer_reviews.title: Worn them for years.. Just needed replacing
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these for years. I don't need them all the time, but when the ankle finally screams at me, these come in so handy. They really take the "ouch" out of a bad ankle! If you wear an insert, remove the bottom plate and put the bottom area under your insert.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Great Braces
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Basketball. He’s had a problem with rolling his ankles in the past. These braces have been fantastic for him. He doesn’t complain about comfort nor does he have any movement restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really good for my issues
customer_reviews.text: This really works, I have very weak ankles and they tend to turn in because I don't walk correctly, I have had many sprained and broken ankles this brace keeps me walking correctly....
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recovery and play
customer_reviews.text: After 4 sprains (2 each ankle), I finally bought 2 of these. After I healed up enough to play I started wearing them and am completely satisfied. I don't feel them at all, and they prevent the rolling inward completely. I even used one just in case on a Tough Mudder, and then did a10 mile run last week, did not even notice i had it on. Though cleaning the mud off was a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Flood

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Once I get this positioned correctly, it helps my weak ankle a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Rigid but I don't notice and rigidity while running. For me feels natural. Has held up for 6 months now with no issues. Got me back to running. Total support, seems no risk of respraining while wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me to use at all/
customer_reviews.text: I'm Size 10 1/2 and the Medium I got really shoves a piece of the plastic near the bottom of food hard against skin. Not comfortable for me to use at all/ :(.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like an air cast instead of an ankle brace
customer_reviews.text: Feels like an air cast instead of an ankle brace. Not very good for your knees because they constrict your ankle movement so much. Do not recommend unless you want to blow out your knees.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Plutnicki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I stepped on the other player's foot, not sprain my foot this time.
customer_reviews.author: Hongbing Zou

customer_reviews.title: Fit and function
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward and requires a larger shoe than normal to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter wears this while playing basketball. She loves them...
customer_reviews.author: gramma

customer_reviews.title: but walking doesn't hurt anymore so I'm pretty happy. Do make sure you get the correct ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit bulky around the shoe area, but walking doesn't hurt anymore so I'm pretty happy. Do make sure you get the correct size though.
customer_reviews.author: Slagathor

customer_reviews.title: If you are using them for sports.... you have to buy 2.
customer_reviews.text: These are great to prevent injuring playing volleyball. Only problem I had was I didn't know if it came as a pair or one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i was trying to get the black color but i got the white in the order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought Active Ankle for my daughter for Volleyball. She had the first one for about 5 weeks and it broke. I order another one and it also broke in about the same amount of time. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda From Bedford PA

customer_reviews.title: Purchase espectativas
customer_reviews.text: excellent article acquired for the protection of my ankle while playing tennis. I'm happy playing with fear and not be guarded, and here in Venezuela is somewhat difficult to get these items.
customer_reviews.author: JHONNY HERAZO

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I am using them for volleyball and will be using them for softball in the spring. They are very comfortable. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star is Being Generous
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely, hands down the worst ankle braces. I really get frustrated when I purchase items that are more expensive and the quality is so poor. My daughter plays middle so needs to have ankle braces. We had a brace break after 1 season of school and club; then another new one broke after a few weeks of summer practice. To top it off I need to figure out how to send this thing back bc Amazon's return policy is so limited. 1 month - really??
customer_reviews.author: Janine Downing

customer_reviews.title: Best Ankle Brace Out There
customer_reviews.text: Simply a great ankle brace. I play basketball and while wearing this, have never sprained my ankle. Make sure you get two though because when you wear only one, the other ankle becomes vulernerable. I learned my lesson by only having one worn and when my other ankle got sprained, I bought a second and have been playing around 75% with a sprained ankle. Very good support, there is a breaking in period which causes slight discomfort but aye, for max protection, somethings got to give so. Would buy if it breaks (doubt it will break).
customer_reviews.author: Everett Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good splint
customer_reviews.text: This splint allows you to play and allows flexion/dorsiflexion of the ankle without allowing inversion (rolling the ankle). The hinge squeaked a little. Overall, a good splint to allow you to play with a sprained ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Zagueiro

customer_reviews.title: padding around ankle not very good
customer_reviews.text: Padding on ankle and leg very thin foam. I dont think will last very long. Strap system to tighten brace is not designed very good the T1 has a much better strap system. Not as comfortable to wear as the T1 brace. If I was to buy another brace again I would buy the T1 instead of the T2.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Arnold

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: no choice for color. Picture was black, I expected black. White came.
customer_reviews.author: Jg&my3

customer_reviews.title: Best ankle brace that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I use ankle braces for all court sports (racquetball, tennis, squash) & volleyball. Best ankle brace that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't work for me. The issue was the hard sides hurt my ankle when I walked, and the pad under the heel was bothering me, too bulky. I went to the ASO laceup level III and it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great brace
customer_reviews.text: I like this brace! My coach recommend it to me since I have rolled my ankle two times in the past. But you need to order 2. Wearing just one feels weird an uncomfortable. Make sure you order two! Great brace. Impossible to roll an ankle in it. Perfect for volleyball players.
customer_reviews.author: Emski

product_meta.title: Active Ankle T2 Rigid Ankle Brace For Injured Ankle Protection and Sprain Support, Cheerleading, Football, & Volleyball Ankle Braces, Volleyball Gifts, Wear Over Socks in Any Sport, White
product_meta.description: Active Ankle and Cramer have been the leading names in ankle protection for the last decade. From the development of the original Model 80 figure eight brace to the innovation of the bi-lateral hinge; Active Ankle and Cramer have been at the forefront of innovation in the ankle brace category. It isn’t just ancient history – Cramer and Active Ankle continue that philosophy of innovation today with braces that are proven on the field and accepted in the training room.
feature_bullets: T2 Rigid Ankle Braces offer an exceptional level of protection with a quick-fit single strap that is adjustable for both low-top and high-top shoes
Fits left or right foot, and offers maximum performance and protection for sports like volleyball, basketball and football
Sleek, less-bulky brace features feather-light, custom molded EVA padding, which hugs every contour of the ankle and is custom molded for fit and comfort
Anatomical bilateral hinge allows full foot range of motion up and down, which makes it suitable for sprains and strains

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
